subject: Re: Faraday Cage
author: draiga1
full_text:
Hi Frank,

It is fascinating. That woman's voice came though so nicely. 

I tried sitting the box near me without asking questions and as far as I can tell, no one spoke to me. When I ask questions I usually get answers, though. 

I wonder if I did it your way more often, if they may start speaking up. It seems when Steve turns on the boxes he builds, they talk to him even though he hasn't asked anything. But then again, maybe they only do that with people who build the boxes. 

~Draiga

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Thanks. I don't do investigations, and usually asking questions does not
> work for me, so I am not 100% on how much the entities rely on broadcast
